CustomField.formula: IF(FinServ__Account__r.IsPersonAccount = TRUE, FinServ__Account__r.FirstName + " " + FinServ__Account__r.LastName, FinServ__Account__r.Name) + IF(FinServ__Role__c = "Representante", "é representante de", IF(FinServ__Role__c = "Representado", " é representado por ", " está relacionado à ")) + IF(FinServ__RelatedAccount__r.IsPersonAccount = TRUE, FinServ__RelatedAccount__r.FirstName + " " + FinServ__RelatedAccount__r.LastName, FinServ__RelatedAccount__r.Name)
CustomField.label: Descrição
